verbs.description: [ARG2: Nuclear] - [V: tinged] [ARG1: threats] . Name - calling . Missiles flying over Japan . Emergency war council meetings . And now , a face - to - face meeting . President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un have sparked fears of a mushroom cloud conflict between two nuclear - armed countries . But in the unpredictable Trump era , their Tuesday morning summit in Singapore seems a fitting next chapter for the two heads of state .
